text: You take out your prized dirk and sink it into the blood paint. It is at least an inch thick. You hope desperately that this is just the blood of creatures and monstrosities, not of intelligent creatures like you. You pull down, and the blood squelches and rolls down somewhat neatly. This reveals a pattern of three tokens with different symbols on them lined vertically on the left. At the bottom of all is a horizontal configuration of three other tokens with different symbols on each. You quickly figure out that the horizontal tokens are able to be moved into the empty slots directly opposing the vertically lined tokens.
